2000.context: Gartner, Inc. is a technology research and advisory company focused on IT research, executive advisory, and conferences. Leading IT research firm. Magic Quadrants influential.

competitors.name: META Group
competitors.notes: Chief rival in IT research until acquired by Gartner in 2005

competitors.name: IDC (International Data Corporation)
competitors.notes: Global provider of market intelligence, advisory services, and events for IT markets; IDC MarketScape competes with Magic Quadrant

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Market research company providing technology impact advice; Forrester Wave reports compete with Magic Quadrant

competitors.name: Burton Group
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in IT research (later acquired by Gartner)

competitors.name: Frost & Sullivan
competitors.notes: Founded 1961, provides market research and growth consulting across technology sectors

2005.context: Gartner, Inc. is a technology research and advisory company focused on IT research, executive advisory, and conferences. Expanded consulting and advisory services.

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Major competitor with similar business model of reports, advisory services, and events; Forrester Wave reports compete with Gartner's Magic Quadrant

competitors.name: IDC (International Data Corporation)
competitors.notes: Strong competitor founded 1964; IDC MarketScape is equivalent to Gartner's Magic Quadrant; over 50 countries presence

competitors.name: META Group
competitors.notes: Chief rival until Gartner acquired it in 2005, eliminating key competitor

competitors.name: Burton Group
competitors.notes: Direct competitor eventually acquired by Gartner

competitors.name: Frost & Sullivan
competitors.notes: Business consulting firm providing market research and analysis across technology sectors

competitors.name: Deloitte
competitors.notes: Big Four firm with consulting arm competing in digital transformation and technology implementation

competitors.name: McKinsey & Company
competitors.notes: Top-tier management consulting firm with technology advisory practice

2010.context: Gartner, Inc. is a technology research and advisory company focused on IT research, executive advisory, and conferences. Executive programs growing. Digital strategy research.

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Strongest competitor with focus on customer experience/journey; Forrester Wave competes with Magic Quadrant; known for creative, out-of-the-box thinking

competitors.notes: Premier global provider of IT market intelligence; IDC MarketScape equivalent to Magic Quadrant; strong in market data and forecasting

competitors.name: Ovum

competitors.name: 451 Research

competitors.name: Info-Tech Research Group

competitors.name: Gigaom
competitors.notes: Focused on actionable technology research and market analysis across various sectors

competitors.name: Nucleus Research
competitors.notes: ROI-centric approach with Value Matrix competing with Magic Quadrant methodology

competitors.name: Deloitte
competitors.notes: Big Four consulting firm competing in digital transformation and IT advisory

competitors.name: McKinsey & Company
competitors.notes: Top management consulting firm with strategic IT practice

competitors.notes: Big Four firm with consulting arm competing in digital transformation and technology implementation

competitors.name: G2

2020.context: Gartner, Inc. is a technology research and advisory company focused on IT research, executive advisory, and conferences. Virtual events during pandemic. Research demand strong.

2024.context: Gartner, Inc. is a technology research and advisory company focused on IT research, executive advisory, and conferences. AI and emerging technology research. Evanta peer forums.

competitors.name: Forrester Research
competitors.notes: Strongest competitor; Forrester Wave evaluations and Total Economic Impact studies; focus on customer experience, product leaders, IT strategists; helps de-risk major technology selections

competitors.name: IDC (International Data Corporation)
competitors.notes: Deep coverage of IT spending, hardware, software markets; benchmark source for market sizing and forecasts; IDC MarketScape vendor assessments; specialized in IT infrastructure, telecom, AI, IoT

competitors.name: 451 Research
competitors.notes: Detailed reports and market data in cloud, data management, information security; known for tracking emerging technology developments and innovation impact

competitors.name: Omdia
competitors.notes: Part of Informa Tech; broad research across telecom, media, technology; integrates sector knowledge with market data and vendor analysis; focused on networks, devices, digital services

competitors.name: Everest Group
competitors.notes: Dedicated focus on digital transformation and technology services; differentiates by specialization in digital technology navigation

competitors.name: TSIA
competitors.notes: Strategically focused alternative designed for technology and services industry; operational and financial realities of tech-driven businesses; specialized performance frameworks

competitors.notes: IT research and advisory providing strategic decision support for CIOs and IT leaders

competitors.notes: Market research and analysis with growth strategy consulting across technology sectors
